This is the main screen from where you access audio controls, Android MediaPlayer class should be used to play audio files
Believe it or not, no matter how proficient you are, if you are not a native speaker sometimes you need lyrics!
This is where you jump from a song to another
Look up for songs to listen, either locally or remotely
